item.description:
Flying season starts with Jaffrey :-)

That's right! Opening day is a big day... Official opening of Kimballs in AFN is April 12th.

How about we go for dinner? Lets enjoy the great wx we are expecting this year on our Wednesday Night Fly Outs! Bring it on...

If you havent had their pepper rings, you're missing out. Get an order to share. The Lobster rolls are a way to start off our real Flying Season.

 

Leave KFIT at 5:30 so we can get out of AFN BEFORE sunset. Or you might be sleeping at Harvey's.

 

Need a ride, got a ride? Answer when RSVPing for one of our favorite short hops.

 

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: There're Baaack! Lobster Rolls and Pepper Rings at Kimballs !!!!
